title: Bug 13196 [Browsing] Consequences of changes
OB: When there is an open editor, all manipulations work on both the working copy shown in the editor and the actual working copy.
EB: However, both manipulations currently behave the same way. Expected behavior is that if there is an open editor, all manipulations should only work on the working copy shown in the editor.
SR: Ensure that manipulations performed on the working copy are limited to the version displayed in the editor when an editor is open.
